import { Component, EventEmitter, Output } from '@angular/core'; import{RegistrationService}from'../../app/registration.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.css'] }) export class NavbarComponent { constructor(private api:RegistrationService){} logout():void { this.api.logout(); } currentUser: any; customers:any; ngOnInit():void{ this.api.apiCall().subscribe((data)=>{ this.customers= data; }) } getUserRole() { return localStorage.getItem('userRole'); } }
